message.body: Mike! I've been a terrible friend. But I've been dreading this text: I am not going to be back in Philly in time for your party. I've been in Baltimore and I think I might stay through the weekend. I'm sorry.

Hey. You're still a great friend. I understand. I found out this thing might be less fun than I thought. They told us to be professional and not drink too much. And I'm leaving early on Sunday to go camping.
How was Ingrid's graduation? I saw pictures on Facebook. You two looked beautiful.

I couldn't make her graduation :( but I came in time for her post graduation shopping spree! We really wanted matching dresses! Thanks- we def took a ton of pictures! Enough to make strategic choices about which to post.
Ha. I thought that was her graduation
No ha. Just a store with flattering lighting!
